thread.title: Japan's annual snow festival kicks off showcasing giant ice sculptures

title: Japan's annual snow festival kicks off showcasing giant ice sculptures
text:
Japan's annual snow festival kicks off showcasing giant ice sculptures Monday, February 05, 2018 - 00:39 
The Sapporo Snow Festival also celebrates Japanese pop-culture, with sculptures of Astro Boy and characters from Final Fantasy. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Sapporo Snow Festival also celebrates Japanese pop-culture, with sculptures of Astro Boy and characters from Final Fantasy. No reporter narration. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nH2DbK
